author: KIT-CMS
body:
#### PR description:
This is a backport for #48408. It's needed to produce tau embedding samples with 2024 data, because this is the last branch with the 2024 HLT menu.

#### PR validation:
Unit tests and release validations (136.901,136.902,136.903,136.904,136.905,136.906) are implemented and tested.
title: [14_2_X] Backport tau embedding changes for 2024 production
